General.Name: Z-Com Inc
General.Description: Z-Com, Inc. engages in the research, development, manufacture, and sale of wireless networking solutions. It offers carrier-grade and private network SMB/industrial wireless LAN controllers; indoor and outdoor access points; and Wi-Fi modules. The company also provides 4G LTE cellular gateways; and accessories, such as antennas and power adapters, and PoE injectors. In addition, it offers new energy fields and communication management, private network, wireless surveillance, wireless hotel, rural Wi-Fi, in-vehicle Wi-Fi, smart campus wireless, and carrier Wi-Fi offload solutions. The company was founded in 1995 and is headquartered in Hsinchu City, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 8, Hsin-Ann Road, Hsinchu City, Taiwan, 300
